definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The fossil (skull) of "Peking Man" (LPP) discovered in Zhoukoudian, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京猿人頭骨化石在周口店發現。

sentences.english: We all suppose that fossils are found by accident.
sentences.chinese: 我們都認爲化石的發現純屬意外。

sentences.english: A popular science web about fossils and nature history, and museums.
sentences.chinese: 有關化石和自然歷史的科普及博物館網站。

sentences.english: The fossils in the contents of phosphorus are more than 46 times rock.
sentences.chinese: 化石中的含磷量爲圍巖的46倍以上。

sentences.english: Markers sof the Anthropocene will surely be visible in the fossil record.
sentences.chinese: 人類世一定會在化石記錄中留下的可見的印記。

sentences.english: I discovered the fossil quite by accident.
sentences.chinese: 我發現這塊化石純屬偶然。

sentences.english: An investigation of foraminifera was conducted in the last glacial loess along the coast of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 通過對渤海沿岸末次冰期黃土中有孔蟲化石的研究。

sentences.english: Morphological characteristics of some recent and fossil pollens of Liquidambar .
sentences.chinese: 文章題目楓香屬現代的和某些化石的花粉形態特徵。

sentences.english: A large amount of Dinosaurs skeleton fossils are discovered in Upper Cretaceous strata at the Meipu Town, Yunxian County of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北省鄖縣梅鋪鎮晚白堊世地層中發現大量恐龍化石。

sentences.english: The scientific investigation team found many mammoth fossils in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 科考人員在森林中發現了很多毛象的屍骨化石。

sentences.english: In addition, a brief account is also given on the characteristics of fossil bivalve assemblages.
sentences.chinese: 刊出部分化石圖版，簡述雙殼類化石組合特徵。

sentences.english: The river that formed these deposits was actually not far from an ancient ocean known as the Tethys Sea.
sentences.chinese: 那條化石所在的河流實際上離古老的海洋T都不遠。

sentences.english: There's a difference in interpretation about what a short-chain chlorinated paraffin is.
sentences.chinese: 亨利說，“對短鏈氯化石蠟的定義有不同的解釋。”

sentences.english: Using gravity and carbon, we could theoretically synthesize fossil fuels.
sentences.chinese: 使用中立和碳，理論上我們能夠合成化石燃料。

sentences.english: Fossil wood suggests forests were nearby.
sentences.chinese: 現在的化石木暗示着森林曾就在附近。

definition: ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
specimen/sample/the root cause and symptoms of a disease
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
